doc:
Sean Schemmel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sean_Schemmel 0 Sean Christian Schemmel (born November 21, 1968) is an American voice actor, ADR director, and screenwriter who has worked for Funimation, OkraTron 5000, NYAV Post, 4K Media Inc., Central Park Media and DuArt Film and Video. He has provided voices for a number of English adaptations of Japanese anime, as well as various animated series and video games. His most notable voice role has been the adult version of Goku in the Funimation dub of the Dragon Ball anime franchise. Sean_Christian_Schemmel ( born November_21_,_1968 ) is an_American_voice_actor , ADR_director , and screenwriter who has_worked for Funimation , OkraTron_5000 , NYAV_Post , 4K_Media_Inc. , Central_Park_Media and DuArt_Film_and_Video . He has_provided voices for a_number of English_adaptations of Japanese_anime , as_well_as various_animated_series_and_video_games . His_most_notable_voice_role has_been the_adult_version of Goku in the_Funimation_dub of the_Dragon_Ball_anime_franchise .
